author: Wang, YL
adress: Shanghai Tenth Peoples Hosp, Dept Thorac Surg, Shanghai, Peoples R China
title: Phillygenin Exerts In Vitro and In Vivo Antitumor Effects in Drug-Resistant Human Esophageal Cancer Cells by Inducing Mitochondrial-Mediated Apoptosis, ROS Generation, and Inhibition of the Nuclear Factor kappa B NF-kappa B Signalling Pathway
